# Kenney Pixel UI Pack — 750+ Assets (CC0 1.0)

**License:** CC0 1.0 Universal (Public Domain)
**Source:** https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-ui-pack-750-assets
**Author:** Kenney (https://kenney.nl)

## Download Instructions

1. Visit https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-ui-pack-750-assets
2. Download the zip file from the "Files" section
3. Extract the zip contents into this directory
4. The expected structure after extraction:
   ```
   pixel-ui-pack/
     PNG/
       ...individual pixel UI elements (buttons, panels, icons)...
     Spritesheet/
       ...combined sprite sheets...
     License.txt
   ```

## Usage

These CC0-licensed pixel art sprites are used for:
- Pixel-perfect panel borders and dialog boxes
- Button states (normal, hover, pressed)
- Decorative HUD elements
- Input field frames
- Progress bar components
